A forum homepage displaying a list of posts with titles, authors, categories, and timestamps
A navigation bar with links to Home, Categories, Search, and User Center

Post creation form with fields for title, content (supporting rich text or markdown), and category selection
Individual post detail page showing full content, author info, timestamp, and associated replies
